item.title: Academic
item.description: The highly flexible website framework for Hugo with an extensible plugin mechanism. Create a beautifully simple site in under 10 minutes ðŸš€ Latest release

**I am hiring Ph.D. students. If designing the next-generation Internet, low-latency AR/VR applications, 5G mobile networks, and smart vehicular networks are interesting to you, drop me an email. Visit the group website for more details”. My research focuses on building tools and protocols that facilitate big-data management and movement over the Internet. I study, design, and build intelligent protocols for the next-generation Internet. I utilize these protocols to simplify large science data management and introduce novel functionality that are difficult to implement today.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: I helped teaching the following courses, either as a teaching assistant or a guest lecturer.
